project_plan.name: Basic Data Analysis on CSV File
project_plan.description: Develop a Python program that allows users to perform basic data analysis on a CSV file by calculating and displaying the mean, median, and mode for specified numerical columns.

task.name: Implement functionality to calculate mean for specified columns
Implement functionality to calculate median for specified columns
Implement functionality to calculate mode for specified columns
Write tests for the mean, median, and mode calculations
Execute tests to ensure calculations return the correct results
